name: integrate-sdk
description: Type-safe 3rd party integration SDK for the Integrate MCP server

scripts.prep: bun run type-check && bun run build
scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server && bun run build:adapters && bun run build:ai && bun run build:types && bun run build:copy-types
scripts.build:client: bun build index.ts react.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --external react
scripts.build:server: bun build server.ts oauth.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external @google/genai --external @anthropic-ai/sdk --external openai --external ai --external @langchain/core --external llamaindex --external @mastra/core --external @cloudflare/workers-types --external @openai/agents
scripts.build:adapters: cd src/adapters && bun build *.ts --outdir ../../dist/adapters --target node --format esm && cd ../..
scripts.build:ai: cd src/ai && bun build *.ts --outdir ../../dist/ai --target node --format esm --external @google/genai --external @anthropic-ai/sdk --external openai --external ai --external @langchain/core --external llamaindex --external @mastra/core --external @cloudflare/workers-types --external @openai/agents && cd ../..
scripts.build:copy-types: cp dist/src/ai/*.d.ts dist/ai/ && cp dist/src/ai/*.d.ts.map dist/ai/ && cp dist/src/adapters/*.d.ts dist/adapters/ && cp dist/src/adapters/*.d.ts.map dist/adapters/
scripts.test:unit: bun test tests/protocol tests/integrations tests/client tests/integrations tests/oauth tests/transport tests/utils tests/errors
